mapper.select: SELECT a.test_id ,a.curriculum_id ,a.test_content ,a.test_time ,a.test_date ,a.test_name ,a.class_id ,b.user_id FROM tests a JOIN test_targets b ON(a.test_id = b.test_id) WHERE b.user_id = 7 ORDER BY a.test_id

SELECT a.test_id ,a.curriculum_id ,a.test_content ,a.test_time ,a.test_date ,a.test_name ,a.class_id ,c.curriculum_name ,COUNT(quiz_id) as quizIdCnt ,SUM(quiz_score) as quizScoreSum FROM tests a JOIN quizbox b ON(a.test_id = b.test_id) JOIN curriculum c ON(a.curriculum_id = c.curriculum_id) WHERE a.test_id = #{testId} GROUP BY a.test_id ,a.curriculum_id ,a.test_content ,a.test_time ,a.test_date ,a.test_name ,a.class_id ,c.curriculum_name
SELECT test_id ,test_time ,test_name FROM tests WHERE test_id = #{testId}
